content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a command to browse the website https://www.nytimes.com/ and find the top news articles today, but the command to read the file returned an error. Later, I received a command to browse the same website to find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware. My computer received a command to browse the website, and it found an article about the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico to target the country's top human rights official. The links to the article are the same as before. I received a command to get a summary of the article on the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico, but the text only provides an error message and no information on the topic. However, I received a command from you to browse the website and find an article on the use of Pegasus spyware. My computer successfully browsed the website and found that the article mentions the use of Pegasus spyware in Mexico to target the country's top human rights official. The links to the article are the same as before."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "get_text_summary", "args": {"url": "https://www.nytimes.com/2022/10/05/world/americas/mexico-pegasus-spyware.html", "question": "Can you get a summary of the article on the use of Pegasus spyware?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command get_text_summary returned:  "Result" : The text explains that it cannot answer the question about a summary of an article on the use of Pegasus spyware because it only provides an error message of HTTP 404.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Pegasus spyware Mexico"}}}'}]
"""
